text-case-converter.title: Text Case Converter: Transform Text Instantly & Privately
text-case-converter.description: Free, privacy-focused text case converter. Change text case instantly—no uploads, no ads, 100% client-side. Works offline!
features: Transform text case in seconds—uppercase, lowercase, title case & more
100% private: No data leaves your device—files stay local
No sign-up, no ads, no limits—just fast, free text conversion
Works offline: Perfect for sensitive documents or spotty connections
Supports all devices & browsers—no downloads or installations needed

word-counter.title: Word Counter Pro: Instant Text Analysis Tool
word-counter.description: Free browser-based word counter with real-time results. No upload required – your documents stay private. Count words, characters & sentences instantly!
features: Instant word, character, and sentence counting
Real-time analysis updates as you type
Simple, clutter-free interface for quick use
100% private processing (no data leaves your device)
Works offline and on all modern browsers/devices

character-counter.title: Character Counter Pro: Instant Text Analysis
character-counter.description: Free online character counter with real-time analysis. No upload needed—100% private. Count letters, words, and spaces instantly!
features: Real-time counting as you type
No file uploads—processes entirely in your browser
Simple one-click text analysis
Military-grade privacy (data never leaves your device)
Works on all devices—mobile, tablet & desktop

line-counter.title: Line Counter Pro: Instant File & Text Analysis
line-counter.description: Free online tool to count lines in any file or text instantly. No upload required—100% private processing on your device. Secure, fast, and accurate!
features: Instant line counting with real-time results
Complete privacy—files never leave your device
Simple drag-and-drop or text paste interface
No file uploads required for processing
Works with all text formats and code files

text-cleaner.title: Text Cleaner Pro: Format & Sanitize Instantly
text-cleaner.description: Free online text cleaner that formats, sanitizes & optimizes content instantly. No uploads needed—100% private processing on your device.
features: One-click text formatting & sanitization
Advanced AI-powered cleanup algorithms
Real-time preview of cleaned text
Military-grade privacy (no data leaves your device)
Works offline & on all modern browsers
